name: Git Hub in the Classroom
tagline: Presentation for the 2016 Flexible Learning Conference
body:
### Welcome!
This site was created to demonstrate how GitHub Pages can be used to create a simple website.

### Presentation
You can access the GitHub in the Classroom presentation here:
* [PDF Version](https://github.com/FlexibleLearningConference/GitHub-In-The-Classroom/blob/master/GitHubForEducation.pdf)
* [Keynote Version](https://github.com/FlexibleLearningConference/GitHub-In-The-Classroom/blob/master/GitHubForEducation.key)

### Resources
